lines.text: Maybe, but we are fucking tits against lairs, come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a dancing fucking sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if we go tomorrow, we're probably going to win, and probably most of us are going to survive.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: Unless she is merely scrounging there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that she thinks she's safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look like there was a lot of books there, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's Raishan in her female form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So she can look at books so she doesn't fucking mangle them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, are you worried if we wait, you're going to lose the chance to kill Raishan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we're gonna lose the chance to kill Raishan, it's just a matter of who's killing who first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say that we take eight hours' sleep, and we go there immediately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She thinks she's got cover, but she doesn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will have only been ten hours at best by the time we get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, since you know of the island, and we know where she is, is there any way where we can keep an eye on the island magically from afar? If Raishan moves, we know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, I can incrementally scry on an island and keep an eye on the vicinity, but if I scry directly on Raishan--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you wanna be at your best? Don't you wanna be some fucking wicked badass from the sky? Or do you wanna limp in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, if she's got 100 books to go through, that's gonna take more than two hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She might just be so angry that she's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She might not be fully rested by the time we get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know it feels like an advantage to press, but we were five down at one point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can, but it's not advisable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She has none of her legendary resistances right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not worried about those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long did it take when, um, we injured...was that Vorugal? Who retreated and started healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you came upon a number of empty potions-- things that were part of Umbrasyl's hoard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Raishan might not have that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we're gonna get-- if we wait till tomorrow--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which, if she does have it, she's already taken them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the morning, we sleep through the day, we go tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well then, there's nothing to talk about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's the way to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She may spend all of today going through those books, and then sleep tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think in recent events, I can wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: how much do you heal up overnight, generally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At night, you get full points, and you get back half of your-- half of your hit dice that were spent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'd better get sleeping, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Instead of fighting, we're going to sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, what do you want, Scanlan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have been devil's advocate this whole time-- "I don't wanna die again, but she could kill us!" What do you want, Scanlan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't wanna die either, and I don't wanna watch any of you die again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But if we go right now, you're going to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need your spells to protect us-- you're clutch in a fight-- and without them, you're kind of just a-- a dude.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's very good at becoming a target.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One day you may be a bro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you have something you wanna do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: back in your room, I plunk down a bottle of whatever, and I take out Whisper-- have a seat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Whisper, and I just start gently cutting away burnt edges of hair on your already shorter hair so that the ends are clean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: ♪ I'll try not to let you down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: will you go back to the theater with me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it with you and the theater? (laughing) Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As long as you go back to Zephra with me, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the short thing kinda work? Does it work with my bone structure? The antlers aren't overpowering it, right? The length kind of balanced out this, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it, don't do it, you'll regret it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shut her up with a kiss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is for real, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your next dose of brown suude prepared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pass out from sheer exhaustion.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: (laughing) I feel like I've really grown as a human being.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we've all learned something tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we go to bed, Allura, any chance you'd be able to join us? I know you didn't get to come the last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure she'll want to join us again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've had a full night's sleep, I'm just gonna keep vigil and no longer drink things you procure from your bags without inquiring."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we all set our alarms for exactly eight hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No sleeping in, and just go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I didn't understand that, Vax'ildan!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) Preparing for whatever chaos the next endeavor unfurls.

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: It's such a treat-- such a treat to be able to come back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any chance you'll be here next week?

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: (laughing) You know, so I'll maybe email with you a little bit to see how you feel about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me know, I mean, we'd love to have you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You had a pretty awesome hammer there!

lines.name: PATRICK
lines.text: I, uh--I have yet to actually take him for a test drive in that way, so...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ♪ I'm just looking for one divine hammer ♪♪ (laughing) Breeders--that's The Breeder's, man, -that's the '90s.
